website_summaries.verdict: This attractive cork board offers an extra-large design and a beautiful black frame to match most home and office decor.
pros: Extra-large design for bigger home or office spaces
Features a beautiful black frame for a sleek look
Mounting instructions and tools included in set
cons: Some buyers had issues with the product arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive bulletin board, but it as a major problem: they have skimped on the cork! The cork is so thin that an average tack does not easily go in. It's a struggle to push it, like trying to push a nail into a wall. If you push it all the way in, the tack pokes out the back of the bulletin board and into your wall because the cork is too thin! Not okay. We didn't notice this until we had already unwrapped the board, discarded the packaging and hired someone to hang it. Too much of a hassle to return now, but if this review can save someone else, that would be good.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Yep, mine came with a chipped frame too. I promptly requested an exchange. UPS came to my house a day or two later and I received the replacement item the next day. I love Amazon Prime and I like this cork board. It is perfect size, has a better "widescreen" aspect ratio and looks cooler than all the other boards. Every one complaining about the quality... it is 20 bucks, what do you want? Go to Staples and pay $40-50 for a larger, better board. I would buy again. ~ the wife
customer_reviews.author: G. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Frame not made of wood + problems mounting
customer_reviews.text: The frame is made of cheap press board. The anchor screw mount is slotted on the frame and pops out when mounted on the screws that came with the bulletin board. The board fell on the floor because the pressboard frame was too weak to hold around the mounting screws. Had to repair the mounting hole with sheet metal mending hardware. Very fustrating! Looks good other then this problem. Manufacturer should switch to a wood frame!
customer_reviews.author: DSN

customer_reviews.title: Yes, cork is thin. But it still works.
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews saying that the cork is thin are true. I've seen some say otherwise and took a risk in buying it. The cork is way too thin for a standard sized push pin. But I bought a pack of tiny push pins from Daiso and they work perfectly. My board arrived in great shape and installation was easy enough. I love the black frame, it looks great hung up in my room. It's great for the price, just need to find the right size of push pins.
customer_reviews.author: Aiko

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Seems Well Made
customer_reviews.text: I just hung my new bulletin board at work using the instructions and the measure tape that came with it. The paper made it super easy to hang and it went up with no problems. It's a great bulletin board for the money. The only reason I took a star away is because I really wanted the matte black frame and instead received one with a marble-looking frame. I'm not a fan but it's not worth the hassle to return so I'll work with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and hangs securely
customer_reviews.text: This is a great board. It is sturdy and hangs securely on wall. Frame matches the Board Dudes magnet board that i have right next to it, so blends in with my decor perfectly. I don't plan to move the papers I pin to this bulletin board often, so hoping the cork doesn’t wear out like it can when you are constantly repinning items over an over.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: arrived perfectly, a heavy duty board and frame. ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived perfectly, a heavy duty board and frame. the frame wiggles a bit and i was scared that only securing the top to the wall would make the bottom of the frame fall off, but i added a third screw to the bottom of the frame and it sits very snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Sagan Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Same problem as others have stated
customer_reviews.text: Damaged on arrival I liked everything about this board except the fact that there were two fairly large "tears" on the cork surface. they were in corners on top and bottom. Was going to send it back then realized how big the package was and really did not want to bother. Have put photos over these places, but would not order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Terry M

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and has lots of space. Great price for the size. I use it to display my Disney pins. The only thing I don’t like is that my pins poke through just a little on the back. Wish the cork-board was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Gilej4

customer_reviews.title: Board nice. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is very nice. It looks great on my wall and it's everything I had expected. What I didn't like is that the slots for the screws were not set up the same on both sides of the board so that you could slip the opening over the head of the screw and slide it down into position. And one of the screws wasn't even fully capable of accepting the Phillips head screwdriver. Not all of the opening was properly punched to receive the tool to tighten it down.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Size Cork Board
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cork board for a project. I outlined the frame with Disneyland and California Adventure Park Maps. Then the entire board is covered with pictures from the parks. I used colorful pins to put the pictures on. I now have a great fun piece for my hallway!! I even bought the damaged cork board at a discount and just used a few nails to reinforce the frame before I decoupaged and since I was covering every square inch of the cork board it did not matter if it had chunks missing out of it. Saved me about $7! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cork was so thin that it was peeling at the slighest touch when we removed it from its packaging
customer_reviews.text: We had to use Elmers glue to glue down the two areas in the corners where the cork was peeling off the backing as we removed it from the packaging. Because we are not planning on heavy duty use, and really needed a bulletin board for the office in our new house, and because it was a crazy busy time for us (moving/holidays) and no time to re-package and return this crappy item, we are, reluctantly, keeping this piece of @#$%^. Wish we could give it negative stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K

customer_reviews.title: I used this to display my collection of promotional buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to display my collection of promotional buttons from events and such. They tend to droop / angle a bit (corkboard isn't cloth) but they are held firmly in that position. The pin can jut out the other side of the board, so you'd have to be careful about the angle of the pin if you're using this for buttons. Overall though, I was having a hell of a time trying to find a way to display buttons, and this was a "plug and play" option delivered to my doorstep in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cork board and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cork board and easy to hang! I love that they gave a guide that you can easily attach to the wall to help make sure you put the screws in the wall in the right place! I'm not planning on putting anything particularly heavy on this board so I just hung mine with two push pins while using the guide. It is level and I was done in just a few minutes! The frame around the board looks nice and works well with the other black frames I have in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight, cork is rather thin, but fully functional.
customer_reviews.text: The cork is a bit thin, but functional. Light weight, but the cork is already separating from the backing on upper left side. This is easily remedied however, it still functions for what it is designed. Frame is good looking, cork is consistent in texture.
customer_reviews.author: Gandolf

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product. Keep searching.
customer_reviews.text: The product isn’t all that great. 2 stars because it came apart. It came apart when I installed it. I shouldve trusted my gut feeling because one of the corners was noticeably loose when I unwrapped it. I managed to seal it with gorllla glue and paint it, but the damage is noticable. You can probably find a much sturdier board for cheaper if you search.
customer_reviews.author: Joe714

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not good. It came with chipped paint and the cork was missing in spots. There was paint on the cork. It looked used. I ordered a replacement so we"ll see how that one is. I'll update once I get the replacement
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice corkboard, and it comes with a measuring tape which enables one to properly mark the wall for the mounting screws. Took about five minutes to install - just needs a 1/4" drill bit (and drill) and a philips head screwdriver. A level is a help, too. Very easy to install and looks nice. Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: IOP

customer_reviews.title: It works. It sticks to the wall.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bulletin board that works well as a board for... bulletins. The system it uses to mount to the wall is nice and ensures that there is no wobble or unsteadiness. You have to be careful when measuring your screw holes as they are pretty unforgiving, but when done right it works quite well. My roommate moved away, taking this with him, and I bought the exact one to replace it since the screws were already there. Am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: Great board although a little tough to pin.
customer_reviews.text: This board is beautiful and fits in with my decor perfectly. The only issue I have is that the cork is super tight and it can be a challenge on certain parts of the board to slide a push pin in, but it is doable and my daughter loves it. It helps her keep her assignments and appointments organized in her independent study program. Overall I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn P.

customer_reviews.title: Smashed in corner/quality isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today and when I unboxed it and took the protective cardboard off the corners, I noticed one of the corners was smashed in. The quality of the board overall just doesn't seem that good either. I'd return but it'd be too much of a pain because of the size of it. That said, when my daughter and I pinned some pictures on it, the cork seemed to easily rip off. I'd expect this quality of a less expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bembnowski

customer_reviews.title: Save the Box
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. But even though there were protective covers on the corners, one corner was smashed. I didn’t want the hassle of returning it. If you buy this, SAVE THE SHIPPING BOX. Don’t assume it will be perfect just because the box isn’t crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home office and bill reminders to hang up!
customer_reviews.text: I love using a cork board for bills or important papers we need to use. We had a smaller version of this but we decided to go bigger, glad we did everything hangs great on it and its very well built. Extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trevors Corner

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.text: As the pictures show, the board came wrapped and protected and in excellent condition. No damages and looks pretty sharp. Put some sticky adhesives to the side so I do not have to nail & damage my walls. For the low price, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: StinkyPuppieReviews!

customer_reviews.title: Super, Straight from the Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: What a great buy. Straight out of the Warehouse as "used" but it doesn't look that way. Great size (big) and light enough to move around easily. I am posting TO DO lists for multiple marketing projects right now and about to upgrade the calendar for next year.
customer_reviews.author: M. WaterMelon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, thin cork
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood frame and it looks beautiful, but the cork is just a thin layer over a thicker layer of particle board. Thumb tacks poked out the back and left a noticable hole in the backing. It also arrived damaged; the frame was dented and the cork was torn. Most likely, it was damaged in shipping, as we live in a pretty remote location.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is attractive, but unfortunately it’s missing the required hardware. We had to drill holes in the frame and rig it up, which would be fine but is annoying since we paid for product we weren’t sent.
customer_reviews.author: swomprat

customer_reviews.title: Cork board is too thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office and I went to put a pin in it and it pushed right through the back (normal size office pins). I'm just happy I did this prior to hanging it up on the wall. I'm returning it, because I can't image it holding anything that weighs anything more than a feather.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my growing collection of pins
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my growing collection of pins. I sprayed painted the middle with a black color. Came out beautifully and I was very happy. Came in perfect condition. Will be getting more later on in the future.
customer_reviews.author: franco

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Walls and Sanity
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old daughter is going through a pretty impressive pre-teen phase. She's always putting up things with whatever see has; pins, tacks, my sewing needles, tape - all kinds, glue. She hangs anything up - anything. Tags from clothes, letters, necklaces, small stuffed animals, deflated balloons... anything. I gave her this area to go nuts, with a tin full of tacks. Its durable and the frame is strong - the corners dont look like they will come apart at the seems. It's made it through her abuse (you cant even see the board with all her "collections") I plan on getting her another next to it and my son one (or two) as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: The black framing it makes it look nice for his room
customer_reviews.text: I used the board for my son to put his artwork and things on. The black framing it makes it look nice for his room, but if you look close it has flaws. The cork is not real thick but I expect it will hold up for a couple years at least, hoping for three. It comes with a paper guide to help you hang it straight. It came very well packaged
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Light duty
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, arrived with some blemishes on cork, not heavy duty, but does the job. If you will be using it daily, taking things on and off often, you might prefer a more heavy duty board.
customer_reviews.author: Kim May

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but the cork seems pretty thin. The first one I ordered I had to send back as it arrived damaged. Second one is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy to report that my board arrived intact
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard all of the horror stories, even from my own wife, about ordering cork bulletin boards for delivery and the gruesome states of broken they could arrive in after UPS/FedEx/USPS got done with them. I'm happy to report that my board arrived intact, and it is on the wall of my office. Now I can't wait for my pins to arrive...
customer_reviews.author: John Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a big scratch on the face of the frame,as well as a big chip on top too. Both visible and noticeable because the frame is black. Packaging was not affected so I'm very curious about how this happened. Seems to me that it was damaged before it was packaged for shipping. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanushka

customer_reviews.title: Really nice frame!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I was very pleasantly surprised by the quality of this product! I had planned to put it in my office/den but after receiving it decided to put it in my kitchen!! It just looks so nice!! The frame is a beautiful wood and it is a great functional decorative peace.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Van Buskirk

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless cork board. So hard could not even get a push pin in it. Returned
customer_reviews.author: longnails

customer_reviews.title: The cork itself is micro thin!
customer_reviews.text: Though the backer board itself is thick, the cork veneer is micro thin and was delivered damaged and that's how I observed it's thickness. Not recommended. Wow other reviews seemed to think it was a well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Roberts

customer_reviews.title: When i got the second order by the time my husband hung it up it had little holes everywhere Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This board is over priced. ITS WAAYYY TOOO FRAGILE..I had to to order twice because the first time i recieved it with a huge crack. When i got the second order by the time my husband hung it up it had little holes everywhere Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Talia savage

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size to feature current art work and organize homework ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these boards, one for each of my boys. They are the perfect size to feature current art work and organize homework and projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kim

customer_reviews.title: THE CORK IS PAPER THIN.  PRODUCT DESCRIPTION - NOT TRUE.
customer_reviews.text: THE CORK IS A LAYER THAT IS PAPER THIN. WHEN I USED A PUSH PIN, TO ATTACH A PAPER NOTES TO THE BOARD, IT WOULD BE GOING DIRECTLY THROUGH TO THE HARD SURFACE, BEHIN THE, PAPER THIN CORK . IT WAS DESCRIBED THAT THE CORK WOULD NOT BE AFFECTED AFTER USING PUSH PINS. THAT IS NOT TRUE. UPON REMOVING PINS, IT LEFT CRACKS IN THE CORK. I AM SENDING IT BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product my husband suggested it and I am glad that I took his suggestion. I work from home and it is a handy accessory for me to have on my wall to put important reminder on. Also it is a lot tidy. A definite recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great cork board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great cork board for the price. Good size for my office hallway. The black wood frame is a cut above your average brown on brown bulletin board. Looks great on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I ordered this
customer_reviews.text: I was Leary from some of the reviews I read. I am glad I ordered this. Item arrived very protected no damage at all. The cork is a good thickness. I use standard push pins and have had no issues with them pushing through as other reviewers stated. I would definitely order again if I find I need additional cork boards.
customer_reviews.author: Sonic

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. It came cracked a little bit. Still usable.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box it came in was way too big. The board came a little cracked at the top and you can notice the bit of damage on the cork grain as well if you really look for it. While it is still usable, poor mishandling of the board will definitely cause it to break. The slot in the back that holds up the board to the screw came off while installing. It's not a sturdy product by any means but it looks nice once put up. These should be shipped in more appropriate-sized shipping boxes for less banging around.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: It's ok - arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty nice and looks good. However, it arrived with some damage - lots of little nicks and dents around the outside of the frame, as well as some damage to the cork itself (a 1" chunk was falling out). Overall, nothing that was a deal-breaker - I filled in the dents with a sharpie and they look fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Frame is broke and cork is not attached on one side.  Too expensive to ship back so I am stuck with it.  😒
customer_reviews.text: Damaged item. If I return it I have to pay for shipping. Box was fine so it was shipped like this.
customer_reviews.author: jjhmss

customer_reviews.title: Best Cork board. Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our kids sports events so we could keep a separate calendar for their activities. We have 2 boards like this and they are very durable and love the price. You can pay way more for one of these at Office Max or even Walmart. But to be honest the quality of these seem better for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall very nice
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived in new condition and well packaged. Mounting hardware was included and the item has a nice finish. Upon close inspection there are blemishes in one corner area that almost appear to be from impact of some sort, but no sign of dents and such - so this just boils down to quality control. But for the ~$22 or so I paid shipped to my office, I find this product to be of good value and expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: John Garretson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Put two of them on a wall in my office for things that need attention. Seems to be of good quality and will stop us from putting little holes in the wall like we have been doing for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Stick559

customer_reviews.title: Great Board For Everything!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage daughter's room, she loves it! It's big but not too big and seems to be good quality. I had no problem hanging it up especially since it comes with a paper measure. I am a pro at hanging things so here is a few tips.... use a stud finder and level... I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRI HERRON

customer_reviews.title: great service. It's time for me to make a ...
customer_reviews.text: Really needed a cork board. I'm a busy student and I work a little less than 40 hours. This board helps me to keep track of upcoming events, and miscellaneous items. I am planning on purchasing another cork board from this seller, great service. It's time for me to make a vision board.
customer_reviews.author: LadyHawke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality. It looks great in the office. The cork is a little firm so its hard to push in the tacks, but does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Kids art display
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. We needed extra space to display the kids art work. I love that they can easily hang their own and the black border works well in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMama

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular push pins
customer_reviews.text: The board is a great size, however if you use the standard thumb tack, it pokes through to the other side of the board. You need a smaller push pin for this one. Other then that, I am satisfied with the product and price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oganization
customer_reviews.text: We use this to hang out notes, handouts and important documents. It has been super helpful
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be a good quality cork board
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to attach to my frig to post calendar and other such things on -- it was WAY TOO HEAVY!!!! Must weight five or so pounds! That's okay for some uses, just not mine. It appears to be a good quality cork board. Just be aware that it is also very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Saya

customer_reviews.title: Framed cork board
customer_reviews.text: Great cork board for teenager. Plenty of room to add all kinds of photos. Board was of good quality and looks nice with the black border. Definitely would order again.
customer_reviews.author: cpretzlaff

customer_reviews.title: It's nice looking and I guess a good value
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and I guess a good value. It's very difficult to push the pins through the cork, which is unfortunate because I need to move index cards around frequently. They often fall out, and the cork is very thin so the tacks poke out on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: LilLady

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this board
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and a heavy board. Very happy with this board. Especially since I only paid $20 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Old lady going back to school

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good and appears to be of good quality. The border is not solid black, it's more of a washed black which I think is nicer. The cork board itself is very firm.
customer_reviews.author: Poppabear

customer_reviews.title: The Board Dudes Black framed Cork Board is the perfect size for my home office
customer_reviews.text: The Board Dudes Black framed Cork Board is the perfect size for my home office. I liked that you could hang it vertically or horizontally. The black frame stands out and looks good on the wall. It is really serving it's purpose and my needs!!
customer_reviews.author: hill1000

customer_reviews.title: Great cork board!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a big, thick cork board for my studio, and this is the perfect one! The framing around it gives it a nice touch and the board is thick enough that it doesn’t poke through the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: If you get this and it isn't dented or something it'll suit you fine for whatever you need it for
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly damaged, but not in a way that's immediately apparent. Other than that it's a corkboard and you can't screw that up very much. If you get this and it isn't dented or something it'll suit you fine for whatever you need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Extremely nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board for my home office. It is beautifully put together and much bigger than I imagined. The price was less expensive than some of the other cork boards(under $20) I wouldn't highly recommended this item for home, school, or office. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Seems to work well. I hung it on the wall and tacked up pictures to it - works.
customer_reviews.author: Chilli

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Left corner came damaged. Didn’t want to bother doing an return/ exchange so I will try to patch up the damage myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: came cracked, but still kept it. was not really noticable. exactly what I needed n good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice board for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I hung this vertically so that it's longer and I love it. Fits plenty and it's great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin P.

customer_reviews.title: there's a reason it's so cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I found this for a fraction of the cost of other cork boards. While it looks nice, the cork isn't thick enough to even stick a pin in. Keeping it, but having to tape stuff to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Berget

customer_reviews.title: Like the black frame
customer_reviews.text: Like the black frame, but the board itself is totally HARD --can hardly get a thumb tack into it. Dumb! Why make a board that is impenetrable?
customer_reviews.author: travelgal

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful and Sturdy Board!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I didn't let the negative review influence my decision! This cork board is beautiful, since its got a wood frame and feels sturdy and reliable. I wish it was simpler to hang (they position the nail insertions on each side which forces you to measure) but overall it is a wonderful buy! Go ahead, trust me! p,s, shipping was fast and the item was wrapped appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: but still a good price for this sized board
customer_reviews.text: Frame not as black as the previous one I ordered, but still a good price for this sized board. Good quality. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed that it has paint bubbles and a dent
customer_reviews.text: So excited to add this to my office/craft area, so disappointed that it has paint bubbles and a dent Edit to add - received our replacement and it had a hole in the shipping box, along with the board. Hopefully 3rd times a charm
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. A good solid bulletin board for my home office. Not too heavy, but sturdy. Easy to hang. Nothing even close to this quality or size locally for this price.
customer_reviews.author: cruzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice board
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these boards to hang behind the doors in my son's bedrooms. My only complaint is that there were only hooks for a horizontal hang and none for a vertical hang. I needed to move one of the hooks in order to allow them to hang the way I wanted. Minor work if you have the right tools as I did. I love the look of the boards, especially how nicely the wood is finished.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce in MA.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, useful Board at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made bulletin board. I am using mine for blocking needle point projects, but it would be fine for any number of uses at home, school or work. The price is reasonable (and they offer various sizes to suit your needs.) The board arrived well packaged in a sturdy box and bubble wrap. I am quite pleased with the board and will order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ida's GirlTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like pic! Easy to put up.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks like the picture and does the job. To give you an idea of the size, the board can fit two rows of 4 pieces of legal sized/normal white paper (8 total).
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It made a perfect addition to our playroom for all my kids art ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! It made a perfect addition to our playroom for all my kids art work!Great price! I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cork damage - twice
customer_reviews.text: I chose a higher price bulletin board so that it would look nice. Both Board #1 and its replacement had damage to the cork. I kept the one with minor damage and returned the one with more damage. The hanging system requires installation of two big screws into the wall. I adapted it to a simpler system.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: My family pictures
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a board to place pictures and treasures in my room. I hung it with 3 command strips. It works well for me..
customer_reviews.author: Ellaone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this board - especially the dark border!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this board to create my own postcard collage from postcards I have received from friends around the world. It's pretty big and it gives me space to put all my postcards in one place and with nice display. Nice quality, strong and sturdy! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana D

customer_reviews.title: Pins are hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to the wall easily, no problems to report. I will note that it is a little hard to put the pins on the board; you gotta really push it in there.
customer_reviews.author: LadyAmorosaLuckyDulce

customer_reviews.title: Cork is very firm, looks good, well made from good materials.
customer_reviews.text: Cork material is very firm, you really have to push the tacks in hard to get them in, so it is not the soft porous cork board that I remember as a schoolchild. Works well though, well made and looks good. Does not strike me as flimsy or cheaply made at all. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good quality. It’s hung in my dining room to keep all the kids school activities organized. Very pleased with product and pricing!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: At under 20 bucks I’m very satisfied. It feels like a solid product that will last a long time. My only problem is that I think the cork board is harder than most.
customer_reviews.author: CHC

customer_reviews.title: Love this board for keepsakes
customer_reviews.text: I used this board to hang tickets and wristbands from shows and travels. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S Shap

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than advertised. I measured the poster before I bought this and it doesn't fit as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin for a thumbtack, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It’s so thin that the push pins push right through to the other side. It’s actually a hazard for my five year old because the sharp points on the other side can stick him. I’m still using it, but it’s not worth the money. Worth about 10 bucks tops.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen LaRocca

customer_reviews.title: Well made but HUGE
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made but It is much bigger than it appears on the pics. Big enough to pack a snack or a whole collection of reading glasses....
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Simple and works perfect in the spot I needed it. Good size and value
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Command Center
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my home office “command center”! I paired it with their dry erase board and calendar (with cork border) and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice .... Well worth the, $18.00
customer_reviews.text: I must admit this is way better than I expected. It's nice weight, large surface and perfect for my office!! If you are looking for a sturdy, cork board .... look no further
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good/sturdy quality cork board!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good/sturdy quality cork board - was better than expected for the price, compared to the one at a local office-supply store, this looks to be the same if not better all the way around!
customer_reviews.author: MotoBella

customer_reviews.title: Ok but wish it had better cork
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. The cork is a bit thin and hard to push pins through.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: this is a good quality product, sturdy look - functions for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tufan Tabak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kitchen to organize our busy life. It fit perfectly where I had planned for it to go and looks very nice. Quick note though, I am typically not an instruction follower, and you should follow the instructions for the placement of the hooks. I failed to read and had to re-do. Also, be ready. It comes in a HUGE box.
customer_reviews.author: LNGmom

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to hang and works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help organise my life. It was easy to hang and works well. The quality is not amazing, but fair for the price I paid. The cork is very compact so pushing in pins requires some strength, but once in they definitely hold.
customer_reviews.author: Laurien Bean

customer_reviews.title: The Board is the perfect size for the wall behind my computer it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The Board is the perfect size for the wall behind my computer it is sturdy and looks great. The cork hold the pin firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J.

product_meta.title: The Board Dudes Clear Push Pins, 80 count
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1This 22” x 35” cork board is encased in a black frame that provides a modern look to any work environment. The fine grain cork provides a self-healing surface that closes pinholes after each use. Features: 22” x 35” black framed cork board Fine grain cork hides pin holes after use Use with the other Board Dudes molded frame boards and accessories for a complete environment Mounting hardware included
feature_bullets: Fine grain cork provides a self healing surface that hides pin holes after use
Use with the other home décor boards for a complete look
